p: In addition, a heatmap of hierarchical cluster analysis was conducted to present the results of putatively identified compounds in plant parts extracts of Curculigo spp. and can be used to discover clustering patterns in the datasets. Heatmap was constructed with MetaboAnalyst 4.0. ( https://www.metaboanalyst.ca) using peak areas data (*.csv format) from all compounds detected in the adduct type ([M + H] + and [M − H] −) of each organ of Curculigo species. For hierarchical clustering analysis, distance measures using Euclidean, clustering algorithms using complete, and standardization using autoscale were chosen [ 30, 47].
